sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const MissionWorkerDetailPopup = ({ closePopup, singleWorker }) => { return (
Close

{singleWorker.name}

DURATION: 2+ YEARS
Location: {singleWorker.location}

Has God given you a heart for teaching and a desire to use your gifts cross-culturally? By serving as a teacher with SIM, you can help students grasp the life-changing good news of Jesus Christ while equipping them to navigate their world.


Some of the students at our schools come from homes where they might never otherwise hear the gospel. Others are the children of missionaries, and your service has a direct impact on the effectiveness and longevity of their ministries.

); }; export default MissionWorkerDetailPopup;
